title: Teacher Capacity-Building Workshop for Blended Teaching Method Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Science Curriculum Knowledge and Grasp of Fundamental Instructional Methods
context.additional_context: A corporate teacher training program conducting case-based learning reflecting participants' actual teaching experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more complementary integration strategies for teacher-centered and student-centered instructional methods
Learners can create detailed activity designs for applying blended teaching methods in science classes
Learners can evaluate their instructional method combinations based on peer feedback and suggest improvement directions

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Application Guide

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
